Articles.Content:
I treat this like any other update, however this one is extra special because it has SOOOOO MUCH.

HYPE!
This is going to be the longest week ever! On the plus side, my semester ends Friday, so it's going to be all Kerbal all the time starting Monday!
T-6 days. Or T-144 hours. *Or* T-8640 minutes. ***OR*** T-518400 seconds.

Mods- can I change this to the Official hype thread please?

![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

You should be able to just edit the OP?

In any case, +1 to that.

It's a new part and is called "Something"!

![8imsJAU.png](http://i.imgur.com/8imsJAU.png)
We have less than a week. This is so weird knowing when it will be released! I don't know how to feel...

> 
> We have less than a week. This is so weird knowing when it will be released! I don't know how to feel...

We don't know *exactly* when it will be released, just the day. I just hope they don't do a midnight release.

> 
> It's a new part and is called "Something"!
> [http://i.imgur.com/8imsJAU.png](http://i.imgur.com/8imsJAU.png)

That might be the fuel cells that Maxmaps and others have mentioned.

> 
> We don't know *exactly* when it will be released, just the day. I just hope they don't do a midnight release.

This is true. I just don't have that constant feeling that I need to check the website every 5 minutes to see if new info about when it might come out has been posted for WEEKS. Next monday I can go bonkers with the F5 I guess.

Seriously though the Hype Train will explode by the time it drops right? We know the freaking day!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-21T13:55:16Z" title="04/21/2015 01:55  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 21, 2015</time> by Kylekov**

> 
> That might be the fuel cells that Maxmaps and others have mentioned.

Sweet! Finally! Thought for a second it was a new kind of RTG.

What are you guys most hyped about? 

I'm hyped about these features (in this order):

1 - new landing gears (I've been praying for new landing gears for 2 years now)

2 - new wings (and ***awesome*** shuttle tail fin)

3 - fairings (at laaaaaast.... my looooove has come along)

4 - new aerodynamics system (and reentry heat)

5 - Ore Mining (and cool antennas to find them)

6 - utility cargo bay (I wasn't expecting that!)

7 - ROUND8 wasn't removed

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-21T14:09:57Z" title="04/21/2015 02:09  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 21, 2015</time> by h4didact**
Definitely 2. I've been waiting.

New landing gears and fairings. *My kraken, I wanted those ever since the start.*

I'm just a bit scared because my save (which was from *0.25)* will break in the new update.. and all the planes I worked hard on with it.

Plus, the majority of the planes that *will* survive would probably be obsolete in 1.0's aerodynamic system.

In all honesty, I'm more saddened than hyped.. KSP's leaving Early Access, my save will break..

Goodbye, "*default."* 0.25-1.0
Ok, now that we know where we are heading (27th April 2015), it's time to crash a stylish SSTO into the Hypetrain and get on board. Full speed ahead, MOOOAR HYYPE! MOOOAAAR BOOSTERS!

> 
> Ok, now that we know where we are heading (27th April 2015), it's time to crash a stylish SSTO into the Hypetrain and get on board. Full speed ahead, MOOOAR HYYPE! MOOOAAAR BOOSTERS!

I think you mean 'strap to' not 'crash into' ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

#3 and #5 for me. Fairings are a long awaited feature (and pleasantly procedural), and resource mining is going to change my game a lot, I think.

I'm excited for the following things:

1.Everything

2.Everything

3.Everything

and 4.Everything......

So yeah, we are at

6

and counting...

Happy landings!
Will the Hype Train be able to handle the levels of hype just hours before the release?
Moar struts

Greetings,

I am so hyped I get to start KSP Career all over again; but this time in the BARN ! SO...

Hype#1: The Barn !

Hype#2: Bigger Planes?!

Hype#3: A new drill for all my resources !

Hype#4: All the previously mentioned hypes in this thread !

Cmdr Zeta

First article in my Yahoo! news stream:

[https://games.yahoo.com/news/kerbal-space-program-getting-full-123723664.html](https://games.yahoo.com/news/kerbal-space-program-getting-full-123723664.html)

I can't wait to restart career mode - again, for what seems like the 12th time. But it doesn't bother me - each career mode addition has been really well put together, and I'm really looking forward to the new and improved, full featured, career mode in 1.0.

As always I'll be posting videos on SimGamerTV (link in my sig) weekly (usually Two KSP videos per week) focusing on Career Mode with a particular emphasis on getting new players started in the game!

Seriously can't wait - I have restless leg just thinking about it!

> 
> Will the Hype Train be able to handle the levels of hype just hours before the release?

No it will not.
